title: Publish Strategy
subtitle: Share your strategy with the community

codeView.label: Allow code viewing
codeView.desc: Users can view the source code of your strategy

chartView.label: Allow chart viewing
chartView.desc: Visual analysis can be performed on asset charts

scan.label: Allow scanning
scan.desc: Can be used in market scanning tools

backtest.label: Allow backtesting
backtest.desc: Can be tested with historical data

botRun.label: Allow bot execution
botRun.desc: Can be used in automated trading bots

placeholders.description: What does this strategy do, what was it designed for, under what market conditions does it perform best...

info.p1: From here, you can determine which features of your strategy are accessible to users.
info.p2: Each permission affects how your strategy will appear and what actions can be taken with it.
info.tipText: Granting more permissions can help your strategy reach a broader audience.
